Text.Page:
I have an idea for treating his madness, but bear with me. It's a little...unseemly.

He keeps going on and on about how "they're" watching him. He's talking about {@LinkCreature:9#410#gula pillagers}, cunning {@LinkCreature:9#700#Alizarin imp hunters} and {@LinkCreature:9#710#warders}.

Bring me their eyes. We're going to shock some sensibility into that poor man.

You'll find {@LinkCreature:9#410#Gula Pillagers}, cunning {@LinkCreature:9#700#Alizarin imp hunters} and {@LinkCreature:9#710#Alizarin Imp Warders} in the first underground floor of Azarel's Labyrinth.
